column4: hey fellas i have a question about something i changed in gconf-editor
this thread talks about the proper way to change them: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1469475
if you do that that page says to fix it, then it should be okay. basically you will be creating a new theme
also i see in the settings i can change the number of workspaces. i changed it to 7 but nothing happend

I don't know anything about the number of workstations... I think there are several different ways to change the number of them, so I wonder if one overrides another. I don't know where the proper place that change that is
yeah, I know you can control it in compiz properly
do you know where that option is compiz might be?
not off the top of my head. I currently am not using compiz
ahh ok are you using Gnome?
that theme method did not work
I can tell you that my value for button_layout at apps/metacity/general is "close,minimize,maximize:"
did you see what I said a minute ago?
I can tell you that my value for button_layout at apps/metacity/general is "close,minimize,maximize:"
